10 TEST(ImageSize,ShouldPass){
11 
16 
19 
20  double mapSize=20.0;
21  double resolution=0.1;
22 
23  int pixels = (int) mapSize / resolution;
24 
25  // Create an OgMap which is a grayscale (mono) image of size pixels
26  cv::Mat image = cv::Mat::zeros(pixels,pixels, CV_8UC1);
27 
28  // Let's check map size compared to allocation, just in case
29  ASSERT_EQ(pixels, image.rows);
30  ASSERT_EQ(pixels, image.cols);
31 
32  // Let's check the map is allocated all zeros
33  ASSERT_EQ(0,image.at<uchar>(0,0));
34 
35  // Draw a link from top left to botom right corner
36  cv::line(image,cv::Point(0,0),cv::Point(pixels,pixels),cv::Scalar(255,255,255),1);
37 
38  // Let's check the centre is now white (255)
39  ASSERT_EQ(255,image.at<uchar>(pixels/2,pixels/2));
40 
41 }
